title: Love is Strange
description: Eleven authors band together to show you love in its truest, most forbidden form.Only when Burnt Embers rise from Cinder & Smoke can you find Absolution from the Indiscriminate. When Becoming Mrs. Ryan is solely possible by crossing into the unknown. Join the Blood Brothers as they bind together while Keeping Secrets from The Thief & The Liar. And in the Encore, sweet, somber songs of Melancholia can we truly find the meaning of Caim.Love is Strange: A Taboo Anthology for the Ocean Conservancy.**All proceeds from this anthology will be donated to the Ocean Conservancy. https://oceanconservancy.org/**
author: Yolanda Olson
